basics.name: Muhammad Sharjeel Asghar
basics.label: Computer Scientist
basics.summary: Experienced IT professional with expertise in Web development, Logo Designing, Network management, Cybersecurity and DevOps.

work.name: Nestle - KBF
work.summary: Key contributions include implementing the Iris Attendance System using eye scanner technology, installing and configuring Windows Server for secure data management, and managing IT inventory for efficient procurement. Also contributed to installing and maintaining security cameras, enhancing site surveillance and safety.

work.name: Soft Designers
work.summary: Designed visually engaging user interfaces (UI) and user experiences (UX) for software applications, using graphic design tools like Adobe for icons, illustrations, and multimedia elements. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate graphics, ensuring consistency and adherence to UI/UX best practices.

work.name: SS Alliance
work.summary: Leveraged Adobe Illustrator to create unique and visually impactful logos for various media platforms. Responsibilities include brainstorming concepts, developing vector designs, refining based on feedback, and delivering final logos in various formats. Expertise in typography, color theory, and Illustrator's vector tools is essential.

work.name: The Dream Sellers LLC
work.summary: Leveraged data analysis and market research to identify profitable product opportunities and secured wholesale deals through effective brand communication. Optimized inventory levels using management software, coordinated efficient shipment processes, and executed online advertising campaigns on platforms such as Amazon, Facebook, and Instagram. Demonstrated expertise in managing product listings across multiple online marketplaces, including Amazon (USA), eBay, and Walmart.

work.name: MD Billings Inc.
work.summary: Effectively managed cloud-based patient databases, ensuring data accuracy, security, and accessibility for healthcare professionals. Optimized network performance and security while minimizing downtime through proactive monitoring. Implemented software solutions for electronic cheque processing, streamlining financial procedures. Developed secure systems for medical record submissions to ensure data security compliance. Additionally, managed credentialing systems for healthcare professionals with insurance companies and IPAs.

projects.name: Virtual Instructor
projects.summary: Designed and developed a virtual learning software featuring a virtual environment and teacher that delivers lectures and answers FAQs. Built using Maya 3D, Unity Game Engine, 3DS Max, and C#, with a database powered by SQLite. Users can select a subject and corresponding lecture, where the virtual instructor delivers the lecture.
